item.description: Come join us after work and relax with old and new friends. This is a new place and theyâ€™re looking forward to our visit. There is no charge. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 136 Main Street: I-84 to 72E, take Exit 9 Main Street, ramp top turn right, at next light turn right onto Chestnut Street, at next light turn right onto Main Street, facility immediately on left.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.
